content: US Core and several Da Vinci IGs reference HCPCS Level II codes, which I've been told are managed by CMS. As such, they're presumably freely available. Is there any chance of them getting hosted on the HL7 terminology server for validation purposes? (The URL for the code system is urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.285.)
if you provide a set of CodeSystem resources, then it's straight forward. If that's not an option, then things are a little more difficult

@Lloyd McKenzie @Grahame Grieve I've created and pushed the CodeSystem resource for ICD-10-CM and am working the one for ICD-10-PCS. The HCPCS Level II codes are also on the list to do, and I can go ahead and get that one created, as well.
